name: angelssmelting-extended
title: 天使熔炼拓展
author: p.o.d
description: 拓展天使熔炼,添加一些常用的熔炼配方
description_original: Extension to Angel's Smelting providing all metal mixing recipies to metallurgy (Brass, Bronze, etc) and compression on metal casting (eg. Iron Sheet) as well as casting gear wheels and pipes
